001package tictactoe;
002
003/**
004 * Used to check if a player has won the game with the last move they made.
005 * 
006 * @author Tapio Malmberg
007 */
008class VictoryChecker {
009    /**
010     * The player (HUMAN or COMPUTER).
011     */
012    private int player;
013
014    /**
015     * The last moved the player made.
016     */
017    private Coordinate playedMove;
018
019    /**
020     * The game board.
021     */
022    private ImmutableGameBoard gameBoard;
023
024    /**
025     * The number of pieces in a row needed to win.
026     */
027    private int numToWin;
028
029    /**
030     * Creates a new VictoryChecker with the given attributes.
031     * @param gameBoard the game board
032     * @param player the player who made the move
033     * @param playedMove the move made by the player 
034     * @param numToWin the number of pieces in a row needed to win
035     */
036    public VictoryChecker(ImmutableGameBoard gameBoard, int player, Coordinate playedMove, int numToWin) {
037        this.gameBoard = gameBoard;
038        this.player = player;
039        this.playedMove = playedMove;
040        this.numToWin = numToWin;
041    }
042
043    /**
044     * Checks if the player associated with this VictoryChecker has won.
045     * @return true if the player has won with their last move
046     */
047    public boolean hasWon() {
048        return isWinningRow(Directions.DIAGONAL)
049            || isWinningRow(Directions.HORIZONTAL)
050            || isWinningRow(Directions.REVERSE_DIAGONAL)
051            || isWinningRow(Directions.VERTICAL);
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * Checks if there are enough adjacent pieces
056     * in the given direction required for winning.
057     * @param dir the direction to check
058     * @return true if there are enough pieces in a row required for victory
059     */
060    private boolean isWinningRow(Direction dir) {
061        // Positive direction, start position included
062        int nAdjacent = gameBoard.getNumAdjacent(playedMove, dir, player, true);
063
064        // Negative direction, start position excluded
065        nAdjacent += gameBoard.getNumAdjacent(playedMove, dir.reverse(), player, false);
066
067        return nAdjacent >= numToWin;
068    }
069}
